contents.item: I am a slow walker, but I never walk back.
It's not how we fall. It's how we get back up again.
Things don't go wrong and break your heart so you can become bitter and give up. They happen to break you down and build you up so you can be all that you were intended to be.
Most of the important things in the world have been accomplished by people who have kept on trying when there seemed to be no hope at all.
You may have to fight a battle more than once to win it.
Continuous effort - not strength or intelligence - is the key to unlocking our potential.
Keep trying until you have no more chances left.
After climbing a great hill, one only finds that there are many more hills to climb.
By perseverance the snail reached the ark.
If we walk far enough," says Dorothy, "we shall sometime come to someplace.
contents.owner: L. Frank Baum, The Wonderful Wizard of Oz

contents.item: The difference between what we do and what we are capable of doing would suffice to solve most of the world's problems.
Life, Stormy says, is not about how fast you run or even with what degree of grace. It's about perseverance, about staying on your feet and slogging forward no matter what.

NEVER GIVE UPNo matter what is going onNever give upDevelop the heartToo much energy in your countryIs spent developing the mindInstead of the heartBe compassionateNot just to your friendsBut to everyoneBe compassionateWork for peaceIn your heart and in the worldWork for peaceAnd I say againNever give upNo matter what is going on around youNever give up
Where you stand depends on where you sit.
Perseverance is failing 19 times and succeeding the 20th.
Few things are impossible to diligence and skill. Great works are performed not by strength, but by perseverance.
It is common sense to take a method and try it. If it fails, admit it frankly and try another. But above all, try something.
Everything works out in the end. if it hasn't worked out yet, then it's not the end.
contents.owner: Tracy McMillan, I Love You And I'm Leaving You Anyway

contents.item: What is the victory of a cat on a hot tin roof?—I wish I knew... Just staying on it, I guess, as long as she can...
contents.owner: Tennessee Williams, Cat on a Hot Tin Roof

contents.item: The man who is swimming against the stream knows the strength of it.
